<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/helium/l2/hotspots/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a specific hotspot by ID, UUID, asset ID, or ECC key.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The identifier of the hotspot. Can be:\n- UUID: The unique identifier of the hotspot\n- Asset ID: The Solana asset ID of the hotspot\n- ECC Key: The ECC key of the hotspot\n"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
